title: Update F100 Requirement
body:
*In order for CRE8RS to earn the role of F100, they must meet ALL the following criteria:

- 3 months of participation with CRE8R Dao (participation = Discord, weekly meetings, Discourse and Coordinape)
- 3 epochs through Coordinape
- Earned $5000
- There may be other instances where participants don't create content and/or are in special circumstances. We will need deal with these on a case by case basis.  

**NOTE** F100 membership can be revoked if: 
- They do not vote in Snapshot + Coordinape 10 times in total
- Display behaviours that are unlawful and/or inappropriate for the reputation of the DAO

For more info regarding why we're updating F100 requirement, please refer to these two Discourse posts:

 https://discourse.cre8r.vip/t/f100-rights-rules-and-responsibilities-token-distribution/41

https://discourse.cre8r.vip/t/cre8r-distribution-proposal/36/9
choices: Yes, let's go with the update
author: 0xBc005Fa1476d6E4f582B6B067D15D4ed512536ae
